commands.command: UPDATE TOP ( 1 ) dbo.Sheet SET [CustomName] = @CustomName , [AuditStatus] = @AuditStatus , [Contacts] = @Contacts , [Phone] = @Phone , [QQ] = @QQ , [WeiXin] = @WeiXin , [Address] = @Address , [TimeFrom] = @TimeFrom , [TimeTo] = @TimeTo , [Base] = @Base , [People] = @People , [Days] = @Days , [Source] = @Source , [TotalPrice] = @TotalPrice , [UnitPrice] = @UnitPrice , [CostPrice] = @CostPrice , [ReceivedMoney] = @ReceivedMoney , [RemainingMoney] = @RemainingMoney , [Remark] = @Remark , [LastModifyTime] = GETDATE() , [LastModifyUser] = @LastModifyUser WHERE [ID] = @ID
